metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Nightfall has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Melodic Complexity and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Nightfall has sections analyzed in the following keys: B♭ Minor,  and G♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
